Message: Fix: In BEX mode the name of the query got lost under certain circumstances.
Fix for BEX mode. Commands are ignored when resultset is empty to prevent short dump in SAP.
Columns without value are passed as empty strings instead of DBNull.
Fix for Json arrays in writer
Fixed "position" in metadata of Table and OHS (was 1-based instead of 0-based)
Columns can be added to ResultMetadata, independent of original size
